{{headerleaflet|1=Live cams}}

<div id="map" style="position: absolute;left: 0px;top: 0px;width: 100%;height: 100%;"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    // http://leafletjs.com/examples/custom-icons.html
    
    var places = [
        
        // ARGENTINA
        ["Four Seasons Hotel", "Buenos Aires", "Argentina", -34.603836, -58.381560, "UCTfsg3ySfE"], 
        
        // GERMANY
        ["Cuxhaven", "Cuxhaven", "Germany", 53.873326, 8.714198, "J2ggwyOl-_0"], 
        
        // JAPAN
        ["Shibuya crossing", "Shibuya", "Japan", 35.659517, 139.700425, "nKMuBisZsZI"], 
        ["Tokyo Tower", "Tokyo", "Japan", 35.658561, 139.745414, "OIfZAAm8tlA"], 
        
        // NORWAY
        ["Hotel Union", "Geiranger", "Norway", 62.096444, 7.210889, "AuLWGxwPZS4"], 
        
        // SPAIN
        ["Plaza de Sevilla", "CÃ¡diz", "Spain", 36.530002, -6.289423, "NiduuFQL_0A"], 

    ];

    var map = L.map('map').setView([0, 0], 2);
    mapLink = 
        '<a href="https://openstreetmap.org">OpenStreetMap</a>';
    L.tileLayer(
        'https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
        attribution: '&copy; ' + mapLink + ' Contributors',
        maxZoom: 12,
        }).addTo(map);

    for (var i = 0; i < places.length; i++) {
        marker = new L.marker([places[i][3], places[i][4]])
            .bindPopup('<b>' + places[i][0] + ', ' + places[i][1] + ', ' + places[i][2] + '</b><br/><iframe width="300" height="200" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/' + places[i][5] + '?autoplay=1&rel=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>', { autoClose:false, closeOnClick:false, closePopupOnClick: false } )
            .addTo(map);
    }
    
    var t = L.terminator();
    t.addTo(map);
    setInterval(function(){updateTerminator(t)}, 10000);
    function updateTerminator(t) {
      var t2 = L.terminator();
      t.setLatLngs(t2.getLatLngs());
      t.redraw();
    }

</script>
